title: Easy gulab jamun
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon fine semolina', '75g dried milk powder', '1 tablespoon plain flour', '1 pinch baking powder', '2 tablespoons ghee (clarified butter)', '3 tablespoons milk', 'oil for deep frying', 'Syrup', '240ml water', '100g caster sugar', '2 pods cardamom, crushed', '1 tablespoon lemon juice']
